wikipedia_page.main: Kathryn White is a British children's book author  based in Bristol.

response: * Ruby's School Walk – Kathryn White & ill. Miriam Latimer
*Good Day, Bad Day (written by Kathryn White), (Oxford University Press, 2000)
*When They Fight (written by Kathryn White), (Oxford University Press, 2002)

Over the next few years, Kasperek firmly established herself as one of Scotland's leading all-rounders. One of her first notable performances came against Hampshire in the 2009 edition of the County Championship, when she took 3/2 from six overs to help bowl the side out for 76.Hampshire Women v Scotland Women, LV Women's County Championship 2009 (Division Three) – CricketArchive. Retrieved 5 October 2015. Later in the year, against the Netherlands at the 2009 European Championship, she scored a maiden half-century for Scotland, making 58 from 106 balls (including a 135-run partnership with Kari Anderson).Netherlands Women v Scotland Women, Women's European Championship 2009 – CricketArchive. Retrieved 5 October 2015. During the 2010 County Championship season, Kasperek scored 218 runs from her ten matches, behind only Kathryn White for Scotland.Batting and fielding for Scotland Women, LV Women's County Championship 2010 – CricketArchive. Retrieved 5 October 2015. Her best performance was an innings of 68 against Hampshire, which was her only half-century.Hampshire Women v Scotland Women, LV Women's County Championship 2010 (Division Three) – CricketArchive. Retrieved 5 October 2015.

link_mentions.page: McGill Institute for the Study of Canada
response: The theme for 2016 was "Canada on the Global Stage: Exploring Canada's Image and Role in the World". Featured speakers included Inuit Circumpolar Conference (ICC)'s Okalik Eegeesiak, Kenneth Frankel, and Kathryn White.
